title: People of the Waikato
brief_description: A description of the Waikato River in New Zealand’s North Island and Lake Taupo, its main source. Includes views of waterfalls and rapids, hot springs, and geysers in Waikato thermal valley and hydroelectric schemes.
description: A description of the Waikato River in New Zealand’s North Island and Lake Taupo, its main source. Includes views of waterfalls and rapids, hot springs, and geysers in Waikato thermal valley and hydroelectric schemes.
